price: 33. Of zeggen zij: “Hij heeft het (de Koran) verzonnen.” Nee, zij geloven niet!
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
